modal.login_message: ‚ú® Welcome back, nakama! We're glad to see you again on your Dashboard. Continue your adventure: update your profile, check your lists, unlock pending chapters, and stay up to date with your favorite series. The crew has been waiting for you ‚Äî let the journey continue! ‚ú®

characters.luffy_text: The fearless captain with a huge heart and an even bigger dream: to become the Pirate King. His rubber powers allow him to stretch and withstand blows that would be fatal to anyone else. Always optimistic and brave.
characters.zoro_text: The three-sword swordsman, loyal to the core and with unshakable determination. He dreams of becoming the greatest swordsman in the world. Strong, serious, and sometimes a bit absent-minded, especially with directions.
characters.sanji_text: The ship's chef with style and a passion for cooking‚Ä¶ and for women. Expert in combat with kicks that can take down giants, and unmatched elegance. Always concerned with the safety and well-being of his crew.
characters.nami_text: The navigator and strategist of the crew. Intelligent, brave, and a lover of money‚Ä¶ but above all, dedicated to guiding the crew safely through treacherous seas. Her knowledge of weather and cartography is invaluable.
characters.usopp_text: The sharpshooter and storyteller. Always creative with his inventions and weapons, a bit cowardly at first, but with a huge heart. He dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea and protecting his friends.
characters.chopper_text: The adorable reindeer doctor who can transform thanks to the Hito Hito fruit. Curious, naive, and very intelligent in medicine. Always willing to help anyone in need.
characters.robin_text: The archaeologist and scholar seeking to uncover the true history of the world. Intelligent, calm, and strategic. Her power allows her to sprout parts of her body anywhere, making her very versatile in combat.
characters.brook_text: The skeletal musician with a joyful and elegant soul. Master swordsman and talented musician. Despite his macabre appearance, he is fun, playful, and has a great sense of music.
characters.jimbe_text: The helmsman and fish-man, strong, honorable, and wise. Expert in fish-man martial arts and a great protector of his companions. Always keeps calm and balanced in the toughest situations.
characters.final_text: And there are even more characters‚Ä¶ but we're not going to spoil the surprise‚Ä¶ or are we?
characters.final_text_two: If you want to see which other characters join the crew throughout the story, that's up to you...

history.content_intro: One Piece is a Japanese manga and anime created by Eiichiro Oda, combining adventure, action, and comedy. The story follows Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew, known as the Straw Hat Pirates, on their quest for the legendary treasure One Piece to become the Pirate King. The series explores themes of friendship, freedom, and perseverance in a world full of islands, dangerous seas, and mysteries to uncover.
history.content_synopsis: Luffy and his crew travel through the Grand Line, facing enemies, uncovering secrets, and living epic adventures. The story combines battles, supernatural powers thanks to the Devil Fruits, and deep relationships among the characters. Each arc presents unique challenges, allies, and enemies that test their determination and adventurous spirit.
history.content_arcs: The story is organized into sagas that mark great adventures and challenges:

sub_content_arcs.enies_lobby: Enies Lobby ‚Äì Rescue and clashes with the law
sub_content_arcs.marineford: Marineford ‚Äì Conflicts with the Navy and historical events
sub_content_arcs.dressrosa: Dressrosa ‚Äì Struggles for a kingdom's freedom
sub_content_arcs.wano: Wano ‚Äì Epic battles against the Yonko and secrets from the past

history.content_world: Key elements of the One Piece world:

sub_content_world.grand_line: Grand Line: a sea full of dangers and adventures
sub_content_world.devil_fruits: Devil Fruits: special powers that grant unique abilities
sub_content_world.organizations: Organizations: Navy, Shichibukai, Yonko, and Revolutionaries
sub_content_world.treasure: One Piece treasure: the pirates' main motivation and the central mystery of the story

sub_content_fun.longest_manga: One Piece is one of the longest and most popular mangas in the world
sub_content_fun.secrets: It contains secrets, cultural references, and Easter eggs that enrich the story
sub_content_fun.inspiration: It inspires other series and games thanks to its detailed and creative world

items_back_up.text_what: A complete website where users can follow their favorite series, unlock rewards, and connect with other fans in real time through an integrated social network. Additionally, they can view all their profile statistics in real time and compare them with other users.
items_back_up.text_dashboard: Each user has a personalized dashboard where they can see all the important aspects they need: real-time notifications from what will become their favorite social network, the last episode watched, and the progress of their favorite series. Additionally, they can check total app time and recent activity, as well as access unlocked rewards such as character cards, ships, weapons, or exclusive items. This personal control center encourages participation and user loyalty.
items_back_up.title_social: üí¨ Integrated Social Network Inspired by Twitter
items_back_up.text_social: The app allows users to: Post comments, analyses, and opinions. Interact with other fans through likes, comments, and reposts. Follow other users and discover interesting content. This makes the app an active community where users participate and share experiences.
items_back_up.text_content: Access to chapters and arcs in a structured and chronological manner. Gradual unlocking of content as they progress. Constant incentives to consume more content and collect rewards.
items_back_up.text_gamification: Progress is rewarded with an experience and level system: Each watched chapter generates experience points. Users ascend through hierarchical levels according to their progress. Collectible rewards motivate users to continue consuming content. Global rankings encourage competitiveness and interaction among users.
items_back_up.text_mobile: Designed to be fully accessible from mobile devices, ensuring smooth and fast navigation. Optimized experience for any screen size. High user retention thanks to its intuitive design.

faq.title_what_is: What is this One Piece app?
faq.text_what_is: It is a social network inspired by Twitter, but set in the world of One Piece. You can follow chapters, unlock characters, ships, and items, and manage everything from your own Dashboard.
faq.title_how_create_profile: How do I create my profile?
faq.text_how_create_profile: From the Dashboard, go to the 'Profile' section. There you can customize your avatar, username, and pirate biography.
faq.text_how_unlock_characters: Characters are unlocked by following chapters of the series or completing challenges within the app. Each story progress gives you access to new nakamas.
faq.text_what_are_items: Items are collectible objects inspired by the world of One Piece, such as Devil Fruits or treasures. They allow you to personalize your experience and improve your profile.
faq.title_can_interact_users: Can I interact with other users?
faq.text_can_interact_users: Yes! You can follow other pirates, like their posts, comment, and share theories about One Piece.
faq.text_what_is_dashboard: The Dashboard is your personal base. From there you manage your profile, see your unlocked characters, ships, items, series cards, and track your progress.
faq.text_what_are_series_cards: They are collectible representations of chapters, scenes, and characters. As you progress in the story, you unlock new cards for your collection.
faq.title_need_to_pay: Do I need to pay to use the app?
faq.text_need_to_pay: The app is free. Some additional features or premium collectibles may be available as optional purchases.
faq.title_how_report_bug: How do I report a problem or bug?
faq.text_how_report_bug: In the Dashboard, you'll find the 'Help' section. From there you can report errors or suggest improvements.
faq.title_use_without_seen: Can I use the app without having seen One Piece?
faq.text_use_without_seen: Of course! Although it is designed for fans, it can also serve as a fun guide to follow the series and discover its characters gradually.
faq.text_special_events: Yes. Periodically we launch themed events (like the One Piece anniversary or highlighted sagas) that allow you to unlock unique content.
